data.name: Agonizing Demise
data.oracle_text:
Kicker {1}{R} (You may pay an additional {1}{R} as you cast this spell.)
Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated. If this spell was kicked, Agonizing Demise deals damage equal to that creature's power to the creature's controller.

data.name: Agonizing Syphon
data.oracle_text: Agonizing Syphon deals 3 damage to any target and you gain 3 life.
data.flavor_text:
"Your death will take a mere moment, but it will feel like an eternity."
—Vilis, Broker of Blood

data.name: Angrath's Fury
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature. Angrath's Fury deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker. You may search your library and/or graveyard for a card named Angrath, Minotaur Pirate, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you search your library this way, shuffle.

data.name: Annihilating Fire
data.oracle_text: Annihilating Fire deals 3 damage to any target. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.
data.flavor_text:
"The most impressive performances can be done only once."
—Mote, Rakdos madcap

data.name: Arc Blade
data.oracle_text:
Arc Blade deals 2 damage to any target. Exile Arc Blade with three time counters on it.
Suspend 3—{2}{R} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {2}{R} and exile it with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)

data.name: Arc Trail
data.oracle_text: Arc Trail deals 2 damage to any target and 1 damage to another target.
data.flavor_text:
"Don't try to hit your enemies. Concentrate on the space between them, and fill the air with doom."
—Spear-Tribe teaching

data.name: Arrow Storm
data.oracle_text:
Arrow Storm deals 4 damage to any target.
Raid — If you attacked this turn, instead Arrow Storm deals 5 damage to that permanent or player and the damage can't be prevented.
data.flavor_text: First the thunder, then the rain.

data.name: Artillerize
data.oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact or creature.
Artillerize deals 5 damage to any target.
data.flavor_text: Phyrexian or Mirran, most goblins stick to the job they know best.

data.name: Atarka's Command
data.oracle_text:
Choose two —
• Your opponents can't gain life this turn.
• Atarka's Command deals 3 damage to each opponent.
• You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.
• Creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain reach until end of turn.

data.name: Backlash
data.oracle_text: Tap target untapped creature. That creature deals damage equal to its power to its controller.
data.flavor_text: Darigaaz decided his foe would be more useful as a weapon.

data.name: Banefire
data.oracle_text:
Banefire deals X damage to any target.
If X is 5 or more, this spell can't be countered and the damage can't be prevented.
data.flavor_text: For Sarkhan Vol, the dragon is the purest expression of life's savage splendor.

data.name: Barbed Lightning
data.oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Barbed Lightning deals 3 damage to target creature.
• Barbed Lightning deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker.
Entwine {2} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)
data.flavor_text: Every creature on Mirrodin is a lightning rod.

data.name: Beacon of Destruction
data.oracle_text: Beacon of Destruction deals 5 damage to any target. Shuffle Beacon of Destruction into its owner's library.
data.flavor_text: The Great Furnace's blessing is a spectacular sight, but the best view comes at a high cost.

data.name: Bee Sting
data.oracle_text: Bee Sting deals 2 damage to any target.
data.flavor_text:
Busy as a bumblebee, blistered as a goblin.
—Alaborn saying

data.name: Bee Sting
data.oracle_text: Bee Sting deals 2 damage to any target.
data.flavor_text: There are few things as motivating as a swarm of bees.

data.name: Blast from the Past
data.oracle_text:
Madness {R}, cycling {1}{R}, kicker {2}{R}, flashback {3}{R}, buyback {4}{R}
Blast from the Past deals 2 damage to any target. If this spell was kicked, create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token.

data.name: Blaze

data.flavor_text: Fire never dies alone.

data.name: Blaze
data.oracle_text: Blaze deals X damage to any target.
data.flavor_text: "Spreading flames illumined cloud and sea: Cao Cao went down; 'twas Zhou Yu's victory."

data.name: Blaze
data.oracle_text: Blaze deals X damage to any target.

"This isn't what I meant by 'facing the heat of battle!'"

data.name: Blaze
data.oracle_text: Blaze deals X damage to any target.
data.flavor_text: Fire never dies alone.

data.name: Blazing Salvo
data.oracle_text: Blazing Salvo deals 3 damage to target creature unless that creature's controller has Blazing Salvo deal 5 damage to them.
data.flavor_text: Barbarians equate courage with the ability to endure pain.

data.name: Blightning
data.oracle_text: Blightning deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker. That player or that planeswalker's controller discards two cards.
data.flavor_text: In the spirit of inquiry, Tibalt applied a battery of agony spells. They yielded nothing on the vampire's whereabouts, but the screams were reward enough.

data.name: Blightning
data.oracle_text: Blightning deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker. That player or that planeswalker's controller discards two cards.
data.flavor_text: While the smell of burning flesh is common in Grixis, the odor of smoldering brain matter is a rare treat.

data.name: Blightning
data.oracle_text: Blightning deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker. That player or that planeswalker's controller discards two cards.

data.name: Blur of Blades
data.oracle_text: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature. Blur of Blades deals 2 damage to that creature's controller.
data.flavor_text: Samut battled her way through the hordes, shouting the names of those who'd died in her crop and those she hoped yet to save.

data.name: Bolt of Keranos
data.oracle_text: Bolt of Keranos deals 3 damage to any target. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
data.flavor_text: The breakthroughs granted by Keranos, god of epiphany, can be surprisingly literal.

data.name: Bonfire of the Damned

Bonfire of the Damned deals X damage to target player or planeswalker and each creature that player or that planeswalker's controller controls.

data.name: Book Burning
data.oracle_text: Any player may have Book Burning deal 6 damage to them. If no one does, target player mills six cards.
data.flavor_text: The wizard's spellbook was full of burning questions.

data.oracle_text: Borrowing the East Wind deals X damage to each creature with horsemanship and each player.

data.oracle_text: Any player may have Breaking Point deal 6 damage to them. If no one does, destroy all creatures. Creatures destroyed this way can't be regenerated.

Breath of Darigaaz deals 1 damage to each creature without flying and each player. If this spell was kicked, it deals 4 damage to each creature without flying and each player instead.

data.name: Breath of Malfegor
data.oracle_text: Breath of Malfegor deals 5 damage to each opponent.
data.flavor_text: The blood of the demons quickened as their master rose over the battlefield. The blood of the angels also quickened: here was the chance to finally end the war started millennia ago.

data.name: Breath of Malfegor
data.oracle_text: Breath of Malfegor deals 5 damage to each opponent.
data.flavor_text: The draconic demon loomed over Dack, and he suddenly sensed he wasn't the only Planeswalker that Malfegor had encountered.

data.name: Brimstone Volley

Morbid — Brimstone Volley deals 5 damage instead if a creature died this turn.

data.flavor_text:
"In raiding and plundering, be like fire, in immovability like a mountain."

data.oracle_text: Burn the Impure deals 3 damage to target creature. If that creature has infect, Burn the Impure deals 3 damage to that creature's controller.
data.flavor_text: Flame doesn't kneel to Phyrexia.

"Her mind is an incredible mix of emotion and power. Even if I could grasp it, I couldn't hold it for long."
—Jace Beleren, on Chandra Nalaar

data.name: Char
data.oracle_text: Char deals 4 damage to any target and 2 damage to you.
data.flavor_text: Izzet mages often acquire their magic reagents from dubious sources, so the potency of their spells is never predictable.

data.name: Char
data.oracle_text: Char deals 4 damage to any target and 2 damage to you.
data.flavor_text: If you've never choked on the embers of your own spell, you aren't casting it hard enough.

data.name: Choking Sands

data.flavor_text:
"The people wiped the sand from their eyes and cursed—and left the barren land to the hyenas and vipers."
—Afari, *Tales*

data.name: Cinder Cloud

Claws of Wirewood deals 3 damage to each creature with flying and each player.

data.flavor_text: "Crackle" and "pop" are the most wondrous sounds.

data.name: Comeuppance
data.oracle_text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you and planeswalkers you control this turn by sources you don't control. If damage from a creature source is prevented this way, Comeuppance deals that much damage to that creature. If damage from a noncreature source is prevented this way, Comeuppance deals that much damage to the source's controller.

data.flavor_text:
"Mine is not the warmth of compassion."
—Ertai, wizard adept

data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature. Consign to the Pit deals 2 damage to that creature's controller.

data.name: Crater's Claws

{U/R}{U/R}, Discard Creative Outburst: Create a Treasure token.

data.name: Cryoclasm
data.oracle_text: Destroy target Plains or Island. Cryoclasm deals 3 damage to that land's controller.
data.flavor_text: The people of Terisiare had come to live on frozen fields as though on solid ground. Nothing reminded them of the difference more clearly than the rifts brought on by the Thaw.

data.name: Culmination of Studies
data.oracle_text: Exile the top X cards of your library. For each land card exiled this way, create a Treasure token. For each blue card exiled this way, draw a card. For each red card exiled this way, Culmination of Studies deals 1 damage to each opponent.
data.flavor_text: Will's quick thinking meshed with Rowan's raw power to bring down the Blood Avatar.

data.name: Cunning Strike
data.oracle_text:

Draw a card.
data.flavor_text:
"The opponent who blocks the path, becomes the path."
—Shu Yun, the Silent Tempest

data.name: Dakmor Plague
data.oracle_text: Dakmor Plague deals 3 damage to each creature and each player.
data.flavor_text: The tiniest cough can be deadlier than the fiercest dragon.

data.name: Dark Nourishment

data.name: Death Grasp
data.oracle_text: Death Grasp deals X damage to any target. You gain X life.

data.name: Death Grasp
data.oracle_text: Death Grasp deals X damage to any target. You gain X life.

data.name: Electrodominance
data.oracle_text: Electrodominance deals X damage to any target. You may cast a spell with mana value X or less from your hand without paying its mana cost.
data.flavor_text: "Basically, we turn a bunch of little lightnings into one big lightning."

data.name: Electrostatic Blast
data.oracle_text: Electrostatic Blast deals 2 damage to any target. When you cast your next instant or sorcery spell, exile the top three cards of your library. You may play one of those cards until end of turn.

data.name: Ember Shot
data.oracle_text:
Ember Shot deals 3 damage to any target.
Draw a card.
data.flavor_text: Dwarves bring poor coal to market, use good coal in their homes, and throw their best coal away.

data.name: Energy Bolt
data.oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Energy Bolt deals X damage to target player or planeswalker.
• Target player gains X life.
data.flavor_text: Life and death are two faces of the same coin.

data.name: Essence Backlash
data.oracle_text: Counter target creature spell. Essence Backlash deals damage equal to that spell's power to its controller.
data.flavor_text:
"The other guilds will learn the hard way not to interfere with our investigations."
—Bori Andon, Izzet blastseeker

data.name: Essence Drain
data.oracle_text: Essence Drain deals 3 damage to any target and you gain 3 life.
data.flavor_text:
"The elves are right: Death inevitably leads to life. But the truly powerful don't just experience this cycle. They control it."
—Crovax, ascendant evincar

data.name: Essence Drain
data.oracle_text: Essence Drain deals 3 damage to any target and you gain 3 life.
data.flavor_text: Mephidross claims all life within it. What cannot be twisted is absorbed.

data.name: Eternal Flame
data.oracle_text: Eternal Flame deals X damage to target opponent or planeswalker and half X damage, rounded up, to you, where X is the number of Mountains you control.

data.name: Evincar's Justice
data.oracle_text:
Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)
Evincar's Justice deals 2 damage to each creature and each player.

data.name: Exploding Borders
data.oracle_text: Domain — Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. Exploding Borders deals X damage to target player or planeswalker, where X is the number of basic land types among lands you control.
data.flavor_text: Reuniting a world is not a gentle process.

data.name: Explosive Impact
data.oracle_text: Explosive Impact deals 5 damage to any target.
data.flavor_text:
"Such boorish noise is what passes for subtlety among the Boros."
—Vraska

data.name: Explosive Singularity
data.oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may tap any number of untapped creatures you control. This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature tapped this way.
Explosive Singularity deals 10 damage to any target.

data.name: Explosive Singularity
data.oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may tap any number of untapped creatures you control. This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature tapped this way.
Explosive Singularity deals 10 damage to any target.

data.name: Explosive Welcome
data.oracle_text: Explosive Welcome deals 5 damage to any target and 3 damage to any other target. Add {R}{R}{R}.
data.flavor_text: Rowan and Will were a natural fit in Prismari College, the school of outrageous elemental arts.

data.name: Exquisite Firecraft
data.oracle_text:
Exquisite Firecraft deals 4 damage to any target.
Spell mastery — If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, this spell can't be countered.
data.flavor_text: Chandra's gift set her apart and others aflame.

data.name: Exquisite Firecraft
data.oracle_text:
Exquisite Firecraft deals 4 damage to any target.
Spell mastery — If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, this spell can't be countered.

data.name: Eye for an Eye
data.oracle_text: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, instead that source deals that much damage to you and Eye for an Eye deals that much damage to that source's controller.

data.name: Face to Face
data.oracle_text: You and target opponent play a best two-out-of-three Rock, Paper, Scissors match. If you win, Face to Face deals 5 damage to that player.
data.flavor_text: Befuddled by this new game, Argg longed for the days of Rock, Rock, Rock.

data.name: Famine
data.oracle_text: Famine deals 3 damage to each creature and each player.
data.flavor_text:
"Better to starve to death than be bored to death."
—Liliana Vess

data.name: Famine
data.oracle_text: Famine deals 3 damage to each creature and each player.
data.flavor_text: "But it was a year of dearth. People were reduced to eating leaves of jujube trees. Corpses were seen everywhere in the countryside."

data.name: Fanning the Flames
data.oracle_text:
Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)
Fanning the Flames deals X damage to any target.

data.name: Farideh's Fireball
data.oracle_text:
Farideh's Fireball deals 5 damage to target creature or planeswalker. Roll a d20.
1—9 | Farideh's Fireball deals 2 damage to each player.
10—20 | Farideh's Fireball deals 2 damage to each opponent.

data.name: Fateful End
data.oracle_text: Fateful End deals 3 damage to any target. Scry 1.
data.flavor_text:
"Everything will be put back in its proper place."
—Klothys, god of destiny

data.name: Fault Line
data.oracle_text: Fault Line deals X damage to each creature without flying and each player.
data.flavor_text:
We live on the serpent's back.
—Viashino saying

data.oracle_text:
Choose three. You may choose the same mode more than once.
• Fiery Confluence deals 1 damage to each creature.
• Fiery Confluence deals 2 damage to each opponent.

data.name: Fiery Confluence
data.oracle_text:
Choose three. You may choose the same mode more than once.
• Fiery Confluence deals 1 damage to each creature.
• Fiery Confluence deals 2 damage to each opponent.
• Destroy target artifact.

data.name: Fiery Gambit
data.oracle_text: Flip a coin until you lose a flip or choose to stop flipping. If you lose a flip, Fiery Gambit has no effect. If you win one or more flips, Fiery Gambit deals 3 damage to target creature. If you win two or more flips, Fiery Gambit deals 6 damage to each opponent. If you win three or more flips, draw nine cards and untap all lands you control.

data.flavor_text: "Let the flames ignore the sinless."

data.name: Fire Ambush
data.oracle_text: Fire Ambush deals 3 damage to any target.
data.flavor_text: "With fire he broke the battle at Bowang . . . . Striking fear deep into Cao Cao's soul, thus Kongming scored a coup at his debut."

You may sacrifice two Mountains rather than pay this spell's mana cost.

data.flavor_text: Embermages aren't well known for their diplomatic skills.

data.oracle_text:
You may sacrifice two Mountains rather than pay this spell's mana cost.

Flashback {4}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
data.flavor_text: "There's more where that came from!"

data.name: Firebolt
data.oracle_text:
Firebolt deals 2 damage to any target.
Flashback {4}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
data.flavor_text: Reach out and torch someone.

data.name: Fires of Undeath
data.oracle_text:
Fires of Undeath deals 2 damage to any target.
Flashback {5}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
data.flavor_text: "I drink of those who are worthy of my palate. The rest I burn."

data.name: Fire Tempest
data.oracle_text: Fire Tempest deals 6 damage to each creature and each player.

data.name: First Volley
data.oracle_text: First Volley deals 1 damage to target creature and 1 damage to that creature's controller.
data.flavor_text:
"We searched their bodies for signs of the blades that had killed them, but found nothing more than scorched flesh."
—Tender-Hand, kitsune healer

data.name: Flamebreak
data.oracle_text: Flamebreak deals 3 damage to each creature without flying and each player. Creatures dealt damage this way can't be regenerated this turn.
data.flavor_text:
"Now I'm thirsty."
—Korva, Vulshok battlemaster

data.name: Flame Burst
data.oracle_text: Flame Burst deals X damage to any target, where X is 2 plus the number of cards named Flame Burst in all graveyards.
data.flavor_text: As hot as a dwarf's rage.

data.name: Flame Jab
data.oracle_text:
Flame Jab deals 1 damage to any target.
Retrace (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a land card in addition to paying its other costs.)
data.flavor_text:
"Fire's out. Should be safe now."
—Gnarltrunk

data.name: Flame Javelin
data.oracle_text:
({2/R} can be paid with any two mana or with {R}. This card's mana value is 6.)
Flame Javelin deals 4 damage to any target.
data.flavor_text: Gyara Spearhurler would have been renowned for her deadly accuracy, if it weren't for her deadly accuracy.

data.name: Flame Javelin
data.oracle_text:
({2/R} can be paid with any two mana or with {R}. This card's mana value is 6.)
Flame Javelin deals 4 damage to any target.

data.name: Flame Jet
data.oracle_text:
Flame Jet deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
data.flavor_text: Did the land make the Keldons? Did the Keldons make the land? Or were they simply meant for each other?

data.name: Flame Lash
data.oracle_text: Flame Lash deals 4 damage to any target.
data.flavor_text: "This is just my warm-up."

data.name: Flame Rift
data.oracle_text: Flame Rift deals 4 damage to each player.
data.flavor_text:
"You might want to step back."
—Jaya Ballard, task mage

data.name: Flame Rift
data.oracle_text: Flame Rift deals 4 damage to each player.
data.flavor_text: Crovax hungered for power, and the stronghold devoured the sky.

data.name: Flames of the Blood Hand
data.oracle_text: Flames of the Blood Hand deals 4 damage to target player or planeswalker. The damage can't be prevented. If that player or that planeswalker's controller would gain life this turn, that player gains no life instead.
data.flavor_text: Many ogres extracted blood oaths from the oni they summoned. Others simply extracted blood.

data.name: Flame Spill
data.oracle_text: Flame Spill deals 4 damage to target creature. Excess damage is dealt to that creature's controller instead.
data.flavor_text: Fragile, floating Skysail suddenly seemed like an appealingly safe place to live.

data.name: Flame Wave
data.oracle_text: Flame Wave deals 4 damage to target player or planeswalker and each creature that player or that planeswalker's controller controls.
data.flavor_text:
"I hear the roaring of a wave whose waters are red and whose mists are black."
—Oracle *en*-Vec

data.name: Flaming Gambit
data.oracle_text:
Flaming Gambit deals X damage to target player or planeswalker. That player or that planeswalker's controller may choose a creature they control and have Flaming Gambit deal that damage to it instead.
Flashback {X}{R}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

data.name: Flare
data.oracle_text:
Flare deals 1 damage to any target.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
data.flavor_text: The secret of destruction is simple: everything burns.

data.name: Flare
data.oracle_text:
Flare deals 1 damage to any target.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
data.flavor_text:
"In the forest, fires light the sky as black clouds unfold their weight."
—"Love Song of Night and Day"

data.name: Flare
data.oracle_text:
Flare deals 1 damage to any target.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
data.flavor_text:
"I strive for elegance and speed in my work."
—Jaya Ballard, Task Mage

data.name: Fodder Launch
data.oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a Goblin.
Target creature gets -5/-5 until end of turn. Fodder Launch deals 5 damage to that creature's controller.
data.flavor_text: Leave it to a boggart to come up with a projectile as disgusting as it is deadly.
